email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is October 15-20. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider $50.75 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can bring the freight rate down to $51.25 per metric ton, which is our best offer given the current market. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. We can agree to $51.25 per metric ton and the demurrage rate of $25,000 per day. Let’s proceed with the laycan of October 15-20. Please send over the charter party agreement for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Charter Party Agreement
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that we’re aligned. I’ve attached the draft charter party agreement for your review. Let me know if there are any adjustments needed. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Charter Party Agreement
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, the charter party agreement looks good. We’ll sign and return it shortly. Thanks for your help in getting this sorted. Looking forward to working with you on this shipment. Cheers, John
